channel.title: [Req] Character Design
channel.description:
Since TUT's isn't working, I need a how-to to make a Character Design screen appear with ::characterdesign or something or if you could just tell me how to add a character design screen I'll just make a code that'll open it.
Guide must be compatible with Cheez Base (Most of the server is my work but the base I'm using is Cheez)
No Talking About Rep
